DECLARE @CommunityId_op varchar(8) DECLARE @JobNumber_op varchar(8)
SELECT @CommunityId_op = job.CommunityId, @JobNumber_op = job.JobNumber FROM vJobSaleLookup vjsl INNER JOIN JOB_Jobs job ON vjsl.JobNumber = job.JobNumber WHERE vjsl.SaleId = :SaleId
exec COM_OptionPrerequisites_sel @CommunityId = CommunityId_op
